thread.title: Kylie Jenner's"Kylighter" Highlighter Collection Will Make Your Cheekbones Visible From Mars
thread.title_full: Kylie Jenner's"Kylighter" Highlighter Collection Will Make Your Cheekbones Visible From Mars

title: Kylie Jenner's"Kylighter" Highlighter Collection Will Make Your Cheekbones Visible From Mars
text:
Kylie Jenner's"Kylighter" Highlighter Collection Will Make Your Cheekbones Visible From Mars By Facebook PHOTO: Getty Images 
Today is the day. Ever since Kylie Jenner trademarked the name " Kylighter " last summer, we had a feeling that highlighters would be inevitable. And, after months of semi-patient waiting, it's finally happened: Jenner just revealed her upcoming highlighter collection on her Snapchat. 
The collection includes six colors: a rose-gold that's more rose than gold ("Strawberry Shortcake"), warm beige ("Salted Caramel"), icy gold ("French Vanilla"), rich brown ("Chocolate Cherry"), true gold ("Banana Split"), and, Kylie's favorite, a pale beige tone called Cotton Candy Cream. (Are you hungry yet?) Really, though, we give her credit for being able to choose a favorite, because they're all pretty. 
Fair warning for the faint of heart or anyone who appreciates a subtle look, because these powders are packed with shimmer and pigment. We can't say for sure, but their sparkle would probably be visible in a blackout. Loading
